Class LiftAdvisor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comp3111.chatbot.LiftAdvisor

  • public class LiftAdvisor
extends java.lang.Object
    The LiftAdvisor Class is used to call API from path advisor web and formulates result as a string for reply.
